typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sourcedId as integer,
		name as string,
		type as string,
		parentSourcedId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> org
org foldDown(unroll(),
	mapColumn(
		sourcedId,
		name,
		type,
		parentSourcedId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		sourcedId,
		name,
		type,
		parentSourcedId
	)) ~> sink1
